languages.text: "Если бы кто-то столь нагло командовал в моих владениях, он бы пожалел об этом. Раскрой капкан, смажь его ядом, положи приманку и жди, когда враг сам оборвет свою никчемную жизнь".

"If someone were to walk around my domain so brazenly, they would certainly regret it. Lay open the trap, lace it with poison, put down the bait, and wait for the enemy to end their own worthless life."
languages.original_text: "Если бы кто-то столь нагло командовал в моих владениях, он бы пожалел об этом. Раскрой капкан, смажь его ядом, положи приманку и жди, когда враг сам оборвет свою никчемную жизнь".

languages.text: “如果有人敢如此肆无忌惮地在我的地盘上走来走去，那他们一定会后悔。我建议设下陷阱，抹上毒药，放出诱饵，等待那些敌人结束他们毫无价值的生命。”
languages.original_text: "If someone were to walk around my domain so brazenly, they would certainly regret it. Lay open the trap, lace it with poison, put down the bait, and wait for the enemy to end their own worthless life."

traits.locale_text: “如果有人敢如此肆无忌惮地在我的地盘上走来走去，那他们一定会后悔。我建议设下陷阱，抹上毒药，放出诱饵，等待那些敌人结束他们毫无价值的生命。”

languages.text: «Si alguien se paseara por mis dominios con tanto descaro, sin duda se arrepentiría. Abre la trampa, ponle veneno, pon el cebo y espera a que el enemigo acabe con su propia e insignificante vida».
languages.original_text: "If someone were to walk around my domain so brazenly, they would certainly regret it. Lay open the trap, lace it with poison, put down the bait, and wait for the enemy to end their own worthless life."

traits.locale_text: «Si alguien se paseara por mis dominios con tanto descaro, sin duda se arrepentiría. Abre la trampa, ponle veneno, pon el cebo y espera a que el enemigo acabe con su propia e insignificante vida.

languages.text: 「私の領地を堂々と歩き回る者がいるなら、必ず後悔することになるだろう。罠を仕掛け、毒を塗り、餌を巻き、敵が自らの無価値な人生を終わらせるのを待とうじゃないか」
languages.original_text: "If someone were to walk around my domain so brazenly, they would certainly regret it. Lay open the trap, lace it with poison, put down the bait, and wait for the enemy to end their own worthless life."

traits.locale_text: 「私の領地を堂々と歩き回る者がいるなら、必ず後悔することになるだろう。罠を仕掛け、毒を塗り、餌を巻き、敵が自らの無価値な人生を終わらせるのを待とうじゃないか」

languages.text: « Quiconque oserait se pavaner dans mon domaine de manière aussi éhontée le regretterait amèrement. Posez le piège, enduisez-le de poison, placez l'appât et attendez patiemment que l'ennemi mette fin à sa triste existence de lui-même. »
languages.original_text: "If someone were to walk around my domain so brazenly, they would certainly regret it. Lay open the trap, lace it with poison, put down the bait, and wait for the enemy to end their own worthless life."

traits.locale_text: « Quiconque oserait se pavaner dans mon domaine de manière aussi éhontée le regretterait amèrement. Posez le piège, enduisez-le de poison, placez l'appât et attendez patiemment que l'ennemi mette fin à sa triste existence de lui-même. »

languages.text: "Würde jemand so dreist durch mein Reich spazieren, würde er es gewiss bereuen. Legt die Falle aus, bestückt sie mit Gift und einem Köder und wartet, bis der Feind sein wertloses Leben selbst beendet."
languages.original_text: "If someone were to walk around my domain so brazenly, they would certainly regret it. Lay open the trap, lace it with poison, put down the bait, and wait for the enemy to end their own worthless life."

traits.locale_text: "Würde jemand so dreist durch mein Reich spazieren, würde er es gewiss bereuen. Legt die Falle aus, bestückt sie mit Gift und einem Köder und wartet, bis der Feind sein wertloses Leben selbst beendet."

languages.text: "Benim topraklarımda birisi böylesine yüzsüzce gezecek olsa bin pişman olur. Bir tuzak kur, içini de bir güzel zehirle süsle, yemini koy ve düşmanın o değersiz canını kendi kendine vermesini bekle."
languages.original_text: "If someone were to walk around my domain so brazenly, they would certainly regret it. Lay open the trap, lace it with poison, put down the bait, and wait for the enemy to end their own worthless life."
